resources.string: This app uses asymmetric encryption to encrypt message files. The app starts by creating user\'s public key and private key. If the user wants to send a message to another user, he needs to ask for the other user\'s public key. The user can encrypt a message text file with a password of certain length. The app then encrypts the file with the public key of the target user and send the file to the target user. The target user can then use his private key to decrypt the file. But the file is still password protected. The target user needs to know the password to read the file.
